DESCRIPCION.CURL: Flex the elbows lifting a bar or dumbbells towards the shoulders.
DESCRIPCION.POLEA: Use a high pulley machine, grab the bar with palms facing up, and flex the elbows.
DESCRIPCION.DOMINADAS: Grab a bar with hands shoulder-width apart and pull yourself up until your chin is over the bar.
DESCRIPCION.FLEXIONES: Place your hands on the floor shoulder-width apart, lower your body, and then push up.

DESCRIPCION.COLGADO: Hang from a bar with arms extended, lift your legs until they are parallel to the floor.
DESCRIPCION.RUSOS: Sit on the floor, lean back slightly, twist your torso, and touch the floor on each side.
DESCRIPCION.ELEVACION: Lie on the floor, lift your legs until they form a 90-degree angle with your torso.
DESCRIPCION.SENTADILLAS: Place a barbell on your shoulders, lower your body by bending your knees and hips.

DESCRIPCION.REMO: Bend your torso forward, grab a barbell with hands shoulder-width apart, and lift it towards your abdomen.
DESCRIPCION.REMO_UNA_MANO: Place one knee and one hand on a bench, grab a dumbbell with the other hand, and lift it towards your torso.
DESCRIPCION.SENTADILLAS: As previously described, this exercise can also engage the back muscles.
DESCRIPCION.CRUNCH_PESO: Lie on your back, hold a weight with extended arms, and lift your torso towards your knees.
DESCRIPCION.FLEXIONES: Place your hands on the floor shoulder-width apart, lower your body, and then push up.
DESCRIPCION.DOMINADAS: Grab a bar with hands shoulder-width apart and pull yourself up until your chin is over the bar.

DESCRIPCION.FLEXIONES: Place your hands close together forming a diamond shape, lower your body by bending your elbows, and then push up.
DESCRIPCION.PRESS_BANCA: Lie on a bench, lower the barbell to your chest, and then push it up.
DESCRIPCION.ELEVACION_MANCUERNAS: Lie on an incline bench, lift the dumbbells up, and bring them together over your chest.

DESCRIPCION.PRESS: Sit on a leg press machine, push the platform up with your legs, and then lower it slowly.
DESCRIPCION.ZANCADAS_MANCUERNAS: Step forward with one leg, lower your body until both knees form 90-degree angles.
DESCRIPCION.SENTADILLAS: As previously described, this exercise can also engage the leg muscles.
DESCRIPCION.SALTO_ALTURA: Jump as high as possible, lifting your knees towards your chest while in the air.
DESCRIPCION.PUNTILLAS: Rise up on your toes, holding the dumbbells or barbell on your shoulders.

DESCRIPCION.VUELO_CON_ANILLOS: Grab some rings with extended arms, lift your body until your shoulders are level with your ears.
DESCRIPCION.ELEVACION_VERTICAL_MANCUERNAS: Lift the dumbbells from your thighs until they are above your shoulders.
DESCRIPCION.ELEVACION_MANCUERNAS_DIRECTA: Keep the dumbbells at your sides, lift them laterally until they are parallel to the floor.
DESCRIPCION.DOMINADAS: As previously described, this exercise can also engage the shoulder muscles.
DESCRIPCION.FLEXIONES_INCLINADAS: Place your hands on an inclined bench, lower your body by bending your elbows, and then push up.

DESCRIPCION.FONDO: Sit on a bench with hands at your sides, lower your body by bending your elbows, and then push up.
DESCRIPCION.CURL_POLEA: Use a high pulley machine with a straight bar, lower the bar behind your head by bending your elbows, and then extend them upwards.
DESCRIPCION.ELEVACION_ESPALDA: Lie face down on an incline bench, lift a dumbbell up and back over your head.
DESCRIPCION.ELEVACION: Lie on your back with knees bent, hold a dumbbell with both hands, and lift it upwards over your chest.
DESCRIPCION.FLEXIONES: As previously described, this exercise can also engage the triceps muscles.
